name: Kingdom of Kuru: The Great Race
storyline:
Each year the Kingdom of Kuru holds The Great Race. The prize is a Grand Lumen, a crystal of immense compressed magic.

This year, the royal twins, Kiros and Kara participate for the first time after grueling training with their uncle and army general, Moti.

But things go awry when the crystal is stolen before the race and the kingdom is invaded. It’s is up to you to get back the Grand Lumen and save the kingdom.
summary: Both a platformer and an action racing game, Kingdom of Kuru pits you against both other players and monsters to race through levels using your powers to hinder your rivals and get to the end first.
